Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to deliver unparalleled performance and value. This product is not just an item; it's a solution designed to meet your specific needs and enhance your experience. Given its exceptional quality and features, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $9500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
